intro: Melanospermum, commonly known as the blackseed plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Caryophyllaceae. Melanospermum species are typically found in rocky or sandy soils in temperate regions. These plants are valued for their ornamental appeal and historical use in traditional medicine.
